alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Grant (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 15 at 7:56AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Iowa and southwest Wisconsin, including the following counties, in northeast Iowa, Allamakee and Clayton. In southwest Wisconsin, Crawford and Grant. * WHEN...Until 1000 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 755 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. Between 2.5 and 3.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Platteville, Prairie Du Chien, Waukon, Lancaster, Guttenberg, Fennimore, Postville, Monona, McGregor, Garnavillo, Bloomington, Marquette, Farmersburg, Hardin, Preston, Bridgeport, Beetown, Arthur, Montfort and Wauzeka. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
